lmm.controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lmm.controller.MainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMainController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminStatsController, CreditsController, DetailsFilmController, EditableFilmController, EditableUserController, FavoriteFilmController, FeedbackController, FilmListController, LoginController, ManageFilmController, ManageUserController, MenuController, UserStatsController

    public abstract class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMainController
    This is the MainController class, this class is the most important because it have all the principal resource for the correct functioning of the application.
    Author:
    Roberto Reibaldi,Luca Pascucci
